snippet: A group of New England Patriots fans have sued the NFL in an effort to recover the first-round draft pick taken from the team as punishment for the "Deflategate" scandal....
lead_paragraph: A group of New England Patriots fans have sued the NFL in an effort to recover the first-round draft pick taken from the team as punishment for the "Deflategate" scandal.

headline.main: Patriots Fans Sue NFL Over Team's 'Deflategate' Punishment
headline.print_headline: Patriots Fans Sue NFL Over Team's 'Deflategate' Punishment
